overview: To celebrate Halloween, discover Paul Delay, Chris Loan and Lucas Bouvier in our gay crazy parody about the famous movie "Saw". Chained in squalid toilets, Paul and Lucas will have to play a game dictated by a stranger to ensure their survival. What are the rules? Will they make the right choices? Will they get out of this trap alive?  Only their ingenuity and their ability to fuck in the most bizarre situations may allow them to win the game... If one thing is sure is that there will be tons of sex during this perverse treasure hunt looking like an escape game!
tagline: "Halloween Special - Porn Parody of the Famous Movie"
title: SAW Gay
